forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco beckons with a tranquil charm, cradling the city in the gentle embrace of a soft, mostly cloudy sky. The warmth of the day has settled into a cool night, hovering around 57 degrees, while west-southwest winds whisper through the streets, weaving a mild chill into the balmy air. The clouds, though present, do little to obscure the city’s twinkling lights that dance beneath them, creating a dreamy mosaic over the urban landscape.

As dusk unfolds, the hazy veil of fog remains at bay, leaving the outlines of the iconic structures bold against the backdrop of an indigo sky. This subtle clarity invites strolls along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the city's lush parks to observe the fading light. For the evening, a light jacket would serve well against the brisk breeze, ideal for those wanting to savor the city’s allure as evening descends and the city begins to shimmer. A cozy café or a stroll towards the waterfront might be just the remedy for the soul on this balmy night, under a sky that hints at mystery yet offers comfort.
